original_text: Now the boy Samuel was ministering to the Lord in the presence of Eli. And the word of the Lord was rare in those days; there was no frequent vision.
korean_text: 아이 사무엘이 엘리 앞에서 여호와를 섬길 때에는 여호와의 말씀이 희귀하여 이상이 흔히 보이지 않았더라

sentences.original_text: Now the boy Samuel was ministering to the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 소년 사무엘은 주를 섬기고 있었는데

sentences.original_text: And the word of the Lord was rare in those days;
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 그 날들에는 주의 말씀이 드물었으며
